name: Trapped in the Mines
description:
Controls:

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

Click: Mine/Interact

A web build is coming soon however I need to work on porting it which does take some work. Currently if you want to play on macOS or Linux you need to download LÖVE framework(https://love2d.org/ (~10mb)) and open the .love or source code folder with it.

Font used is a slightly modified m5x7(https://managore.itch.io/m5x7)

Game is made with LÖVE framework.

Source code is free and publicly available however the documentation is bad. Most of the code is in two files and a lot of the objects are hard coded not defined in the map file.
